comments:
- I have a bunch of projects in my workspace including some UI ones and SWT
- I was doing a full build
- in the middle of the "clean", I turned off auto-build and cancelled the clean
- then I selected the 2 SWT projects (swt and swt.win32) and selected Close from
the context menu
- projects seemed to close OK but I got the following exception in my log file
